meanings.definition: Assess the value or quality of something.
meanings.sent1: I will appraise the old book to see how much it is worth.
meanings.sent2: Real estate agents often appraise houses before listing them for sale.
meanings.sent3: The detective decided to appraise the suspect's alibi.
meanings.sent4: She could appraise the situation with a single glance.
meanings.sent5: He carefully appraised each painting before deciding which one to buy.

meanings.sent1: The jeweler will appraise the diamond ring to determine its price.

meanings.sent3: The kids tried to appraise the value of their toy collection.
meanings.sent4: She could appraise the distance just by looking at the map.
meanings.sent5: He quickly appraised the situation and made a decision.
